sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Salesforce.com ( CRM ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 9.1%.
Year to date, Salesforce.com has lost about 13.0% of its value.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Ensco ( ESV ), trading down 9.7%.
Ensco is lower by about 51.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Williams Cos ( WMB ), trading down 8.2%, and Quanta Services ( PWR ), trading up 5.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
